events.name: Increasing demand for electric vehicles and lithium-ion batteries
events.wd_label: Increasing demand for electric vehicles and lithium-ion batteries
events.wd_description: The worldwide increasing demand for electric vehicles leads to high demand for lithium-ion batteries, which have significant environmental and socio-economic impacts.
events.description: The worldwide increasing demand for electric vehicles leads to high demand for lithium-ion batteries, which have significant environmental and socio-economic impacts.

events.name: EV demand
events.wd_description: The demand for electric vehicles is increasing globally.
events.description: The demand for electric vehicles is increasing globally.

events.name: Lithium-ion battery demand
events.wd_description: The increasing demand for electric vehicles leads to a high demand for lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: The increasing demand for electric vehicles leads to a high demand for lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Environmental impacts
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion battery supply chains have significant environmental impacts.
events.description: Lithium-ion battery supply chains have significant environmental impacts.

events.name: Socio-economic impacts
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion battery supply chains have significant socio-economic impacts.
events.description: Lithium-ion battery supply chains have significant socio-economic impacts.

events.name: Legal regulations for battery manufacturers
events.wd_description: Legal regulations, such as the EU Battery Regulation, force battery manufacturers to use secondary materials, comply with CO2 limits, and ensure social conditions along their supply chains.
events.description: Legal regulations, such as the EU Battery Regulation, force battery manufacturers to use secondary materials, comply with CO2 limits, and ensure social conditions along their supply chains.

events.name: Secondary materials
events.wd_description: Battery manufacturers are required to use secondary materials.
events.description: Battery manufacturers are required to use secondary materials.

events.name: CO2 limits
events.wd_description: Battery manufacturers must comply with CO2 limits.
events.description: Battery manufacturers must comply with CO2 limits.

events.name: Social conditions
events.wd_description: Battery manufacturers must ensure social conditions along their supply chains.
events.description: Battery manufacturers must ensure social conditions along their supply chains.

events.name: Assessing battery supply chains
events.wd_description: The life cycle sustainability assessment approach can be used to assess battery supply chains in terms of their environmental, economic, and social impacts. However, this approach often leads to conflicting goals.
events.description: The life cycle sustainability assessment approach can be used to assess battery supply chains in terms of their environmental, economic, and social impacts. However, this approach often leads to conflicting goals.

events.name: Sustainability assessment
events.wd_description: The life cycle sustainability assessment approach assesses environmental, economic, and social impacts of battery supply chains.
events.description: The life cycle sustainability assessment approach assesses environmental, economic, and social impacts of battery supply chains.

events.name: Conflicting goals
events.wd_description: The results of sustainability assessments often lead to conflicting goals between and within sustainability dimensions.
events.description: The results of sustainability assessments often lead to conflicting goals between and within sustainability dimensions.

events.name: Optimization models for sustainable battery supply chains
events.wd_label: Optimization models for sustainable battery supply chains
events.wd_description: Optimization models that take into account the three sustainability dimensions can help derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs. This study combines life cycle sustainability assessment results with a decision support model.
events.description: Optimization models that take into account the three sustainability dimensions can help derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs. This study combines life cycle sustainability assessment results with a decision support model.

events.name: Optimization models
events.wd_description: Optimization models are used to derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs.
events.description: Optimization models are used to derive recommendations for more sustainable battery supply chain designs.

events.name: Decision support model
events.wd_description: The study combines life cycle sustainability assessment results with a decision support model to derive actionable recommendations.
events.description: The study combines life cycle sustainability assessment results with a decision support model to derive actionable recommendations.

events.name: Sustainability dimensions
events.wd_description: The optimization models consider environmental, economic, and social dimensions of sustainability.
events.description: The optimization models consider environmental, economic, and social dimensions of sustainability.

events.name: Implementation and results of the decision support model
events.wd_label: Implementation and results of the decision support model
events.wd_description: The decision support model is implemented in Python and solved using Gurobi, comparing results with the current state of battery supply chains as a benchmark. The study finds that costs and impacts can be significantly reduced in many scenarios.
events.description: The decision support model is implemented in Python and solved using Gurobi, comparing results with the current state of battery supply chains as a benchmark. The study finds that costs and impacts can be significantly reduced in many scenarios.

events.name: Python implementation
events.wd_description: The decision support model is implemented in Python.
events.description: The decision support model is implemented in Python.

events.name: Gurobi solution
events.wd_description: The decision support model is solved using Gurobi.
events.description: The decision support model is solved using Gurobi.

events.name: Benchmark comparison
events.wd_description: The results of the decision support model are compared with the current state of battery supply chains as a benchmark.
events.description: The results of the decision support model are compared with the current state of battery supply chains as a benchmark.

events.name: Cost reduction
events.wd_description: The study shows that costs can be significantly reduced in many scenarios compared to the benchmark.
events.description: The study shows that costs can be significantly reduced in many scenarios compared to the benchmark.

events.name: Impact reduction
events.wd_description: The study shows that environmental and social impacts can be significantly reduced in many scenarios compared to the benchmark.
events.description: The study shows that environmental and social impacts can be significantly reduced in many scenarios compared to the benchmark.

events.name: Trade-offs between cost and sustainability impacts
events.wd_label: Trade-offs between cost and sustainability impacts
events.wd_description: The study finds that strictly reducing environmental and social impacts can lead to higher costs compared to the benchmark. A European-centric supply chain is more environmentally friendly, while a Japan-centric supply chain is more socially friendly.
events.description: The study finds that strictly reducing environmental and social impacts can lead to higher costs compared to the benchmark. A European-centric supply chain is more environmentally friendly, while a Japan-centric supply chain is more socially friendly.

events.name: Cost vs. sustainability trade-offs
events.wd_description: Strictly reducing environmental and social impacts can lead to higher costs compared to the benchmark.
events.description: Strictly reducing environmental and social impacts can lead to higher costs compared to the benchmark.

events.name: European-centric supply chain
events.wd_description: A European-centric supply chain would emerge as more environmentally friendly.
events.description: A European-centric supply chain would emerge as more environmentally friendly.

events.name: Japan-centric supply chain
events.wd_description: A Japan-centric supply chain would emerge as more socially friendly.
events.description: A Japan-centric supply chain would emerge as more socially friendly.

events.name: EU Battery Regulation
events.description: Specific regulation enforcing these requirements.

events.name: Life Cycle Sustainability Assessment
events.description: Methodology for assessing sustainability.
